pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī aññatarassa kulassa kulūpikā hoti niccabhattikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.3: Tena ca gahapatinā therā bhikkhū nimantitā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.4: Atha kho thullanandā bhikkhunī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.8: “Ayyo sāriputto ayyo mahāmoggallāno ayyo mahākaccāno ayyo mahākoṭṭhiko ayyo mahākappino ayyo mahācundo ayyo anuruddho ayyo revato ayyo upāli ayyo ānando ayyo rāhulo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.9: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, gahapati, mahānāge tiṭṭhamāne ceṭake nimantesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.11: “Ayyo devadatto ayyo kokāliko ayyo kaṭamodakatissako ayyo khaṇḍadeviyā putto ayyo samuddadatto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.12: Ayaṃ carahi thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā antarā kathā vippakatā, atha te therā bhikkhū pavisiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.14: “Idāneva kho tvaṃ, ayye, ceṭake akāsi; idāni mahānāge”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.16: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.17: “kathañhi nāma devadatto jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.18: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, devadatta, jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.21: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.23: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.24: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:1.25: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu rājagahā pabbajito ñātikulaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.2: Manussā—“cirassampi bhadanto āgato”ti sakkaccaṃ bhattaṃ akaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.3: Tassa kulassa kulūpikā bhikkhunī te manusse etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.6: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.8: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pubbe gihisamārambhe jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:2.13: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya, aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti sā vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.1.10: pubbe adātukāmānaṃ akattukāmānaṃ— “ayyo bhāṇako, ayyo bahussuto, ayyo suttantiko, ayyo vinayadharo, ayyo dhammakathiko, detha ayyassa, karotha ayyassā”ti esā paripāceti nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.1.16: ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vā pakatipaṭiyattaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.1.17: Aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.2.1: Paripācite paripācitasaññī bhuñjati, aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.2.2: Paripācite vematiko bhuñjati, aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.2.3: Paripācite aparipācitasaññī bhuñjati, aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc29:3.2.4: Ekatoupasampannāya paripācitaṃ bhuñjati, aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
